title: Stainless Steel Appliances, Free Weights, Airy 9' Ceilings
posting_body: Follow This Link for More Information:
Features that hit all the right notes.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 704 Sq.
Nexus East features several style choices, ranging from a 487-square foot studio to a 1,159 square foot two-bedroom?— all outfitted with 9’ high ceilings.
Plus doesn’t it seem like every time you hear about a fantastic new restaurant, bar or coffee shop, it’s in East Austin?
The list is always growing: there’s Justine’s, Launderette, Buffalina, Counter Café, The Brixton, White Horse, Liberty, Grackel, Scoot Inn, Cenote and Cuvee—just to name a few
- Rooftop Deck with views of Colorado River Greenbelt
- Large Co working Spaces with private offices
Pets - allowed | Max 2 allowed | One time fee: $400 | Rent: $20
